column6:
Carol Danvers is stranded and powerless on Monster Island, surrounded by a nest full of Brood, and trying desperately to survive. When the Lightning Storm team comes to her rescue, things only get worse! Brian Reed (Captain Marvel) ,2008,1
and Aaron Lopresti (Incredible Hulk) continue their run towards Ms. Marvel's historic 25th issue with this tale of Monsters and Marvels!
Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Greg Horn | artist:Aaron Lopresti | writer:Brian Reed | inker:Matt Ryan | letterer:Dave Sharpe | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
